de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICFAQEngine


  • public interface ICFAQEngine
    provides functions to manage FAQ module(e.g. text suggestions for the certain mail content) FAQAnswer Declares a set of Methods using to manage FAQ
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getFAQEngineAPI().loadAnswer(id);
